Style/Next.description:
Description

Use `next` to skip iteration instead of a condition at the end.
Style/Next.option:
This rule supports the following parameters in your configuration:

EnforcedStyle: skip_modifier_ifs (type: str)
MinBodyLength: 3 (type: int)
AllowConsecutiveConditionals: False (type: bool)
SupportedStyles: ['skip_modifier_ifs', 'always'] (type: list)
